title: ldn_mitm
author: spacemeowx2
description: A mitm kip modified from fs_mitm
details:
Notice: It has been reported that this tool may not work on the latest firmware and might need an update. Your mileage may vary.

Play local wireless supported games online.

Package also includes the config tool loaded via hbmenu.
